### ðŸŽ¯ Filosofia de Performance

A performance no YouForm Ã© tratada como um **feature crÃ­tico**, nÃ£o uma otimizaÃ§Ã£o posterior. Seguimos o princÃ­pio de **"Performance Budget"** onde cada funcionalidade deve justificar seu impacto na velocidade da aplicaÃ§Ã£o.

### ðŸ“Š MÃ©tricas de Performance Alvo

#### Core Web Vitals

```typescript
// Performance targets
const PERFORMANCE_TARGETS = {
  // Core Web Vitals
  LCP: 2.5,      // Largest Contentful Paint (seconds)
  FID: 100,      // First Input Delay (milliseconds)
  CLS: 0.1,      // Cumulative Layout Shift
  
  // Additional metrics
  TTFB: 600,     // Time to First Byte (milliseconds)
  FCP: 1.8,      // First Contentful Paint (seconds)
  TTI: 3.8,      // Time to Interactive (seconds)
  
  // Custom metrics
  FORM_LOAD: 1.5,    // Time to form fully loaded
  FORM_SUBMIT: 500,  // Form submission response time
  DASHBOARD_LOAD: 2.0 // Dashboard initial load time
};

// Performance monitoring
class PerformanceMonitor {
  static measureWebVitals(): void {
    // LCP measurement
    new PerformanceObserver((list) => {
      const entries = list.getEntries();
      const lastEntry = entries[entries.length - 1];
      
      analytics.track('performance.lcp', {
        value: lastEntry.startTime,
        target: PERFORMANCE_TARGETS.LCP * 1000,
        passed: lastEntry.startTime <= PERFORMANCE_TARGETS.LCP * 1000
      });
    }).observe({ entryTypes: ['largest-contentful-paint'] });
    
    // FID measurement
    new PerformanceObserver((list) => {
      const entries = list.getEntries();
      entries.forEach((entry) => {
        analytics.track('performance.fid', {
          value: entry.processingStart - entry.startTime,
          target: PERFORMANCE_TARGETS.FID,
          passed: (entry.processingStart - entry.startTime) <= PERFORMANCE_TARGETS.FID
        });
      });
    }).observe({ entryTypes: ['first-input'] });
    
    // CLS measurement
    let clsValue = 0;
    new PerformanceObserver((list) => {
      const entries = list.getEntries();
      entries.forEach((entry) => {
        if (!entry.hadRecentInput) {
          clsValue += entry.value;
        }
      });
      
      analytics.track('performance.cls', {
        value: clsValue,
        target: PERFORMANCE_TARGETS.CLS,
        passed: clsValue <= PERFORMANCE_TARGETS.CLS
      });
    }).observe({ entryTypes: ['layout-shift'] });
  }
}
```

### ðŸš€ Frontend Performance Optimization

#### 1. Code Splitting e Lazy Loading

**Route-based Code Splitting:**
```typescript
// Next.js dynamic imports for route splitting
import dynamic from 'next/dynamic';
import { Suspense } from 'react';

// Lazy load heavy components
const FormBuilder = dynamic(() => import('@/components/FormBuilder'), {
  loading: () => <FormBuilderSkeleton />,
  ssr: false // Client-side only for heavy interactive components
});

const AnalyticsDashboard = dynamic(() => import('@/components/Analytics'), {
  loading: () => <AnalyticsSkeleton />
});

const ResponsesTable = dynamic(() => import('@/components/ResponsesTable'), {
  loading: () => <TableSkeleton />
});

// Component-level splitting
const HeavyChart = dynamic(() => import('@/components/Chart'), {
  loading: () => <div className="animate-pulse bg-gray-200 h-64 rounded" />
});

// Conditional loading based on user plan
const PremiumFeatures = dynamic(() => import('@/components/PremiumFeatures'), {
  loading: () => null,
  ssr: false
});

export default function Dashboard({ user }: { user: User }) {
  return (
    <div>
      <Suspense fallback={<DashboardSkeleton />}>
        <FormBuilder />
        {user.plan === 'premium' && <PremiumFeatures />}
      </Suspense>
    </div>
  );
}
```

**Bundle Analysis and Optimization:**
```javascript
// next.config.js
const withBundleAnalyzer = require('@next/bundle-analyzer')({
  enabled: process.env.ANALYZE === 'true'
});

module.exports = withBundleAnalyzer({
  // Optimize bundle size
  experimental: {
    optimizeCss: true,
    optimizePackageImports: [
      'lucide-react',
      '@radix-ui/react-icons',
      'date-fns'
    ]
  },
  
  // Tree shaking optimization
  webpack: (config, { isServer }) => {
    if (!isServer) {
      config.resolve.fallback = {
        ...config.resolve.fallback,
        fs: false,
        net: false,
        tls: false
      };
    }
    
    // Optimize lodash imports
    config.resolve.alias = {
      ...config.resolve.alias,
      'lodash': 'lodash-es'
    };
    
    return config;
  },
  
  // Image optimization
  images: {
    formats: ['image/avif', 'image/webp'],
    deviceSizes: [640, 750, 828, 1080, 1200, 1920, 2048, 3840],
    imageSizes: [16, 32, 48, 64, 96, 128, 256, 384],
    minimumCacheTTL: 31536000 // 1 year
  }
});
```

#### 2. Caching Strategy

**Multi-Layer Caching:**
```typescript
// Service Worker for offline caching
// sw.js
const CACHE_NAME = 'youform-v1.2.0';
const STATIC_CACHE = 'youform-static-v1.2.0';
const DYNAMIC_CACHE = 'youform-dynamic-v1.2.0';

const STATIC_ASSETS = [
  '/',
  '/dashboard',
  '/static/css/main.css',
  '/static/js/main.js',
  '/manifest.json'
];

// Install event - cache static assets
self.addEventListener('install', (event) => {
  event.waitUntil(
    caches.open(STATIC_CACHE)
      .then(cache => cache.addAll(STATIC_ASSETS))
  );
});

// Fetch event - serve from cache with network fallback
self.addEventListener('fetch', (event) => {
  const { request } = event;
  
  // API requests - network first, cache fallback
  if (request.url.includes('/api/')) {
    event.respondWith(
      fetch(request)
        .then(response => {
          const responseClone = response.clone();
          caches.open(DYNAMIC_CACHE)
            .then(cache => cache.put(request, responseClone));
          return response;
        })
        .catch(() => caches.match(request))
    );
    return;
  }
  
  // Static assets - cache first, network fallback
  event.respondWith(
    caches.match(request)
      .then(response => response || fetch(request))
  );
});

// Browser caching strategy
const cacheConfig = {
  // Static assets - long term caching
  static: {
    'Cache-Control': 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable'
  },
  
  // API responses - short term caching
  api: {
    'Cache-Control': 'public, max-age=300, stale-while-revalidate=60'
  },
  
  // HTML pages - no cache for dynamic content
  html: {
    'Cache-Control': 'no-cache, must-revalidate'
  }
};
```

**React Query for Data Caching:**
```typescript
// React Query configuration
const queryClient = new QueryClient({
  defaultOptions: {
    queries: {
      staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes
      cacheTime: 10 * 60 * 1000, // 10 minutes
      retry: (failureCount, error) => {
        // Don't retry on 4xx errors
        if (error.status >= 400 && error.status < 500) {
          return false;
        }
        return failureCount < 3;
      },
      refetchOnWindowFocus: false,
      refetchOnReconnect: true
    },
    mutations: {
      retry: 1
    }
  }
});

// Optimized data fetching hooks
export function useForms() {
  return useQuery({
    queryKey: ['forms'],
    queryFn: fetchForms,
    staleTime: 2 * 60 * 1000, // 2 minutes for frequently updated data
    select: (data) => data.forms, // Transform data to reduce re-renders
    placeholderData: keepPreviousData // Prevent loading states on pagination
  });
}

export function useFormAnalytics(formId: string, period: string) {
  return useQuery({
    queryKey: ['analytics', formId, period],
    queryFn: () => fetchAnalytics(formId, period),
    staleTime: 30 * 1000, // 30 seconds for analytics
    enabled: !!formId, // Only fetch when formId is available
    keepPreviousData: true
  });
}

// Prefetching for better UX
export function prefetchFormData(formId: string) {
  queryClient.prefetchQuery({
    queryKey: ['form', formId],
    queryFn: () => fetchForm(formId),
    staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000
  });
}
```

#### 3. Image and Asset Optimization

**Next.js Image Optimization:**
```typescript
// Optimized image component
import Image from 'next/image';
import { useState } from 'react';

interface OptimizedImageProps {
  src: string;
  alt: string;
  width: number;
  height: number;
  priority?: boolean;
  className?: string;
}

export function OptimizedImage({ 
  src, 
  alt, 
  width, 
  height, 
  priority = false,
  className 
}: OptimizedImageProps) {
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
  
  return (
    <div className={`relative ${className}`}>
      <Image
        src={src}
        alt={alt}
        width={width}
        height={height}
        priority={priority}
        quality={85} // Optimal quality/size balance
        placeholder="blur"
        blurDataURL="data:image/jpeg;base64,
